about.title: About Me!
about.intro1: A curious person, who likes to understand how things work and likes anything related to computers and development.
about.intro2: I consider myself a proactive, responsible, analytical, self-taught person, who likes to work in a team and have a good predisposition to face problems and always willing to learn in order to increase my skills.
about.intro3: My goals are to put into practice the skills I have developed, continue to learn new technologies and best practices, as well as to join a team and collaborate my experience. technologies and best practices, also to join a team and collaborate with my experience. I am open to all opportunities that allow me to grow either as Front end, Back end or Full stack.

projects.title: Projects
projects.pokeintro: Individual academic project of Soy Henrry's bootcamp. It is a SPA (Single Page Application), in which you can see different types of pokemon, you can also filter and/or sort them. You can also create new pokemon.
projects.pokeintro2: This application was developed by me both frontend and backend.This application was developed by me both frontend and backend..
projects.modalpoke: It is a SPA, where an API (PokéAPI) is consumed, the project consisted in showing the Pokémons, searching them in a specific way, filtering and sorting. You can also see the details of each Pokémon by clicking on the image and you can create a Pokémon.
projects.weatherAppintro: It is a SPA (Single Page Application) in which you can search the weather of different cities.
projects.weatherAppintro2: This application was developed by me.
projects.modalweatherApp: It is a SPA, where an API (OpenWeathermap) is consumed. You can search for the city you want to see, it will be displayed on the screen with the temperature, the country and an image of the weather, you can delete that we no longer want to see. Also in More Details option you can see more information about the city.
projects.heanrybankintro: Academic group project of the Soy Henrry bootcamp. It is a virtual mobile wallet, where the user can deposit money, receive money from his account, buy and sell currencies, as well as cryptocurrencies.
projects.heanrybankintro2: In this project I worked on the backend.
projects.modalhenrybank: Henry Bank is a virtual wallet in mobile format (apk) developed in React Native. It was born as an integrative group project to put into practice all the knowledge acquired in the Soy Henry bootcamp. We also work using the SCRUM methodology
projects.MeliCLoneIntro: Project based on MercadoLibre's challenge, but this time we made a clone of MercadoLibre's main page and consumed its API to give it some functionalities.
projects.modalMeliCLone: The main functions of the application are, item search with results view and also filtering, item details showing also questions asked by users.
projects.ChallengeRappi2: This application was developed by me.
projects.modalChallengeRappi: Frontend Developer Challenge of Rappi asked for some requirements for an e-commerce like, menu with sublevels, filter and sort products by price, quantity and availability, create a cart and the products stay in the cart if the user closes the page, etc. All requirements are in the github readme.
projects.ChallengeLogin: Challenge that contains Roles like admin and user, in which we are going to be able to register and when entering we are going to see a table of clients that we can create, modify and eliminate with the role of admin.
projects.ChallengeLogin2: We will also be able to filter them from highest to lowest or vice versa, also search by name and age range.
projects.modalChallengeLogin: For this challenge in the Fronted we used React, Redux for the state management and Tailwind CSS for the styles, also for the password encryption we used JWT. In the Backend part I had to generate a REST API for the Login and the CRUD, which I made the routes with Express.js and for the Database, I was learning to use MongoDB, with the ORM Mongoose. More information can be found in the Readme of the Github repository.
projects.ToDoListIntro: Project that consists of creating your own task list.
projects.ToDoListIntro2: This application was developed by me.
projects.modalTodoList: App used to create your list of tasks, in which we can add them and once we have completed it, we can change its status and delete it, we can also delete a set of completed tasks or clean the entire list without having completed the tasks.
